question: Why a pawn captured my pawn even though it couldn’t on 4th rank?
answer: This capture can happen if you moved your pawn 2 squares forward and opponent’s pawn was also on 4th rank besides yours. This capture is called “en passant”.

question: How to change a picture of my profile?
answer: Go to your profile on the left bottom. On your picture, there’s a button “change”. Press it. Change your picture and press “Upload”.
